Andrew Lawton EXCLUSIVE: Scheer's office directed MPs to cancel justice committee video broadcast of @thejohnrobson, @MarkSteynOnline and @NewWorldHominin testimonies on free speech.https://youtu.be/arzHFiXoCD8

Watch my interview with David @TheMenzoid Menzies on the growing threats to free speech in Canada. It’s getting clearer every day that the Tories are complicit in these Lib/NDP attacks and that only the @peoplespca will defend free speech.https://www.therebel.media/maxime-bernier-interview-free-speech-section-13-andrew-scheer-conservatives …

Always great to discuss the deep ties, shared values, and common interests between Canada and the UK. Thanks to Prime Minister @theresa_may for the meeting in Portsmouth today, focused on the upcoming G20 Summit in Osaka, our trade partnership, and fighting climate change.pic.twitter.com/rH5v6zYV2L

C’est toujours un plaisir de parler des liens, des valeurs et des intérêts communs entre le Canada et le R. U. Merci à la PM @theresa_may pour la rencontre à Portsmouth, axée sur le Sommet du G20 à Osaka, notre partenariat commercial et la lutte contre le changement climatique.pic.twitter.com/Q6xLhiQoZY
Canada is at a turning point. Together, we will usher in a new era of opportunity, of prosperity, and of strength.pic.twitter.com/WP6QUiANtL
Le Canada est à un tournant de son histoire. Ensemble, nous inaugurerons une nouvelle ère pleine de prospérité, d’opportunités et de force.pic.twitter.com/qovVXZsmPY

For over half a century, Leo Gerard has fought relentlessly to improve the lives of working people. I want to congratulate him on his well-earned retirement as International President of the @steelworkers and wish him all the best in this new chapter.https://www.thestar.com/opinion/contributors/2019/06/05/leo-gerard-fought-for-the-rights-of-all-canadians.html …

Pendant plus de 50 ans, à titre de président international des @MetallosCA, Leo Gerard s’est battu sans relâche pour améliorer la vie des travailleurs et travailleuses. Je lui souhaite la meilleure des retraites; il l’a bien méritée! https://www.thestar.com/opinion/contributors/2019/06/05/leo-gerard-fought-for-the-rights-of-all-canadians.html …

Bienvenue à mon collègue et ami @sbergeron parmi les femmes et les hommes de valeur qui veulent (de nouveau dans son cas) porter les couleurs du @BlocQuebecois https://twitter.com/QubRadio/status/1136352986467393537 …

It’s clear that Justin Trudeau has no confidence Canadians will give him another term in government in a fairly fought election. Read my op-ed in the @TheTorontoSun:https://twitter.com/TheTorontoSun/status/1134919185467879425 …

Il est clair que Justin Trudeau comprend que les Canadiens ne lui confieront pas un autre mandat dans le cadre d’élections justes. Lisez ma lettre d’opinion dans le @TheTorontoSun:https://twitter.com/TheTorontoSun/status/1134919185467879425 …

A Canadian energy corridor will help Canadians in *every* province. This will unite our country by making sure all Canadians will benefit from our natural resources.https://twitter.com/nationalpost/status/1136213870480150528 …

Un corridor énergétique canadien aidera les Canadiens de *toutes* les provinces. Il unira notre pays en assurant que tous les Canadiens bénéficient de nos ressources naturelles.https://twitter.com/nationalpost/status/1136213870480150528 …
They are big-C, not small-c conservatives.https://twitter.com/sunlorrie/status/1136241284857905154 …

I discuss the tanker ban bill C-48 as well as the justice committee’s decision to erase Michael Cooper’s comments from the record with my Liberal and NDP colleagues. The Conservatives were too embarrassed to send someone. Watch the video.https://www.ctvnews.ca/video?clipId=1699125&jwsource=twi …
Lest we forget. #DDay75pic.twitter.com/15VPkCDmVT

Today in Portsmouth, we honour the veterans who bravely fought on D-Day and remember those who gave everything to liberate Europe. Their sacrifices paved the way for us to live in free and democratic societies, and we will forever be grateful. #DDay75pic.twitter.com/HNvcHQuwhe
N’oublions jamais. #JourJ75pic.twitter.com/IlQU03RuYb

Aujourd'hui, à Portsmouth, nous honorons les vétérans qui ont courageusement combattu lors du jour J et qui ont tout donné pour libérer l’Europe. Grâce à leurs sacrifices, nous vivons dans des sociétés libres et démocratiques, et nous les en remercierons toujours. #JourJ75pic.twitter.com/HYNZN9QXdG

Read @thejohnrobson’s defence of free speech before the HoC justice committee yesterday. John Stuart Mill’s classic arguments in favour of free speech are as relevant today as they were in 1859.https://twitter.com/nationalpost/status/1135990334234800128 …

On #WorldEnvironmentDay we're reminded that climate change is the single greatest threat we face. So it's time to start fighting it like we want to win. We have a bold plan that'll create at least 300k new jobs & take on big polluters. A New Deal for : https://www.ndp.ca/power-to-change pic.twitter.com/R2kWFNvm5z

La #Journéemondialedelenvironnement est un rappel que les changements climatiques nous menacent chaque jour. Il est temps d'avoir le courage d'agir. Nous avons un plan ambitieux pour créer au au moins 300 000 emplois et s’attaquer aux gros pollueurs : https://www.npd.ca/le-courage-d-agir …pic.twitter.com/wPLBfqqxs6

This is what @TimHortons #CampDay is all about: smiles, sunshine, and making a real difference in kids’ lives. Last year I visited Tim Horton Memorial Camp and got to see first-hand just how important it is to these kids – and your donations today make it possible.pic.twitter.com/a8TSv8H70G

Le #Jourdescamps @chezTimHortons, c’est: des sourires, du soleil & faire une différence dans la vie des enfants. L’an passé, je suis allé au Camp commémoratif Tim Horton pour voir à quel point ce programme est important pour ces enfants. Et tout ça grâce à vos dons d'aujourd’hui.pic.twitter.com/q0i59xftWW

Carbon Taxes do nothing for the environment and make life more expensive for Canadians. Alberta is scrapping this unfair tax on their citizens, and as Prime Minister I will do the same to the federal carbon tax.https://calgary.ctvnews.ca/alberta-reclaims-title-of-cheapest-gas-prices-in-canada-due-to-scrapped-carbon-tax-say-analysts-1.4448946?fbclid=IwAR31LY3dLR_0RDFim6oK9BTxfdzLmzSFaBi7dKK3Q86Irs5DVmmD2imptpM …

Les taxes sur le carbone ne font rien pour l’environnement et rendent la vie plus chère pour les Canadiens. L’Alberta abolit cette taxe injuste et, comme premier ministre, je ferai la même chose avec la taxe fédérale sur le carbone. https://calgary.ctvnews.ca/alberta-reclaims-title-of-cheapest-gas-prices-in-canada-due-to-scrapped-carbon-tax-say-analysts-1.4448946?fbclid=IwAR31LY3dLR_0RDFim6oK9BTxfdzLmzSFaBi7dKK3Q86Irs5DVmmD2imptpM …

After years of efforts to ban shark finning, my bill that didn't pass, @beynate and his bill, and our champ @findonnelly, Sen Michael MacDonald is getting it done! #sharkwater #robstewart #GPChttps://www.cbc.ca/news/politics/tasker-shark-fin-ban-1.5161870 …

Climate change and air pollution are severe global threats – for our environment and our health. On World Environment Day, we’re reminded that we all need to work together to make sure our kids and grandkids have clean air to breathe. #BeatAirPollution https://bit.ly/2XuRPOS pic.twitter.com/pUYFsRg8II

Les changements climatiques et la pollution de l’air sont de graves menaces pour l’environnement et la santé. La Journée mondiale de l’environnement nous rappelle qu’on doit agir ensemble pour offrir un air sain à nos enfants. #CombattreLaPollutionDelAir https://bit.ly/2K0uGAw pic.twitter.com/0lYonbMCny

Canada is one free country, we should have one free market. That's why as PM I will build an open federalism, champion a transformative corridor project and tear down trade barriers in Canada. In Edmonton I was proud to shared My Vision for Canada: A Closer and Freer Federation.pic.twitter.com/UrEeFz6t6g

Le Canada est un pays libre. Nous méritons un marché libre. Comme PM, je vais créer un fédéralisme ouvert, promouvoir le corridor transformateur et lever les barrières commerciales. Hier à EDM, j’ai présenté Ma vision pour le Canada : Une fédération plus proche et plus libre.pic.twitter.com/lcHyfFiiht

Tories silence their MP Michael Cooper, remove him from justice committee, let Libs and NDP erase what he said from minutes, and then remove participant from CTV panel after that topic is added. That’s the type of leadership you can expect from Scheer.https://twitter.com/Gray_Mackenzie/status/1136025953799364608 …
Great work! #GPChttps://vancouverisland.ctvnews.ca/mobile/west-coast-towns-wave-goodbye-to-plastic-straws-bags-1.4451644 …

Happy Birthday Johnny! :)https://twitter.com/MPCelina/status/1135983228412747776 …

I wish I could have joined the PM. I appreciated being invited, but already had too many commitments. It is an historic observance. So much bravery. #GPC #DDay75https://twitter.com/davidakin/status/1136040483929632768 …

Fracked gas has the same carbon footprint as coal. Claims that fracked gas into LNG replacing coal in other countries is a climate solution are - quite simply - wrong. They fuel #climatecrisis. #GPC #climatehttps://twitter.com/DevonRowcliffe/status/1136064045742735366 …
Ian Prittie @thereds8

Thank you to the Premier of Alberta, @jkenney, for your warm welcome and words today. By working with Albertans, and Canadians everywhere, we can build one free market across our country.pic.twitter.com/yLgdvVm9QO

Merci au PM de l’Alberta @jkenney pour son accueil et ses paroles chaleureuses aujourd’hui. En travaillant avec les Albertains et tous les Canadiens, nous établirons enfin un marché libre à travers tout le pays.pic.twitter.com/m6AOcvoW5X

Heading to the UK & France, and this is why: the Canadian heroes who served and sacrificed on D-Day. These veterans and their families were on their way to France when I saw them at the airport. I’ll see you soon when we honour your bravery this week.pic.twitter.com/q8MyGvNc3H

Je me rends au Royaume-Uni et en France pour rendre hommage aux héros canadiens du jour J. Ces anciens combattants et leurs familles étaient en route pour la France lorsque je les ai vus à l'aéroport. Je vous verrai bientôt quand on honorera votre courage cette semaine.pic.twitter.com/rPZ9CgzkU1
